Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers

Class SetupChoiceSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers.FXMLController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers.SetupChoiceSceneController
public class SetupChoiceSceneController extends FXMLController
SetupChoiceController handles the setup phase of the game, from the game started message to the game initializations message
See Also:

    • createImageView

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView createImageView(javafx.scene.image.Image image, String id, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> handler, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> handlerToRemove, double maxWidth)
      Create an image view for a tower or for a wizard. The image view will be created from the specified image and will be associated to the specified handler when the image view is selected.
      Parameters:
      image - the image that will be used to create the image view
      id - the id of the image view
      handler - the handler that will be added to the confirm button
      handlerToRemove - the handler that will be removed from the confirm button
      maxWidth - the maximum width that the image view can have
      Returns:
      the image view of the image

    • addImagesToScene

      private void addImagesToScene()
      Add the images of towers or wizards to the scene

    • waitForOtherPlayersChoices

      private void waitForOtherPlayersChoices()
      Display a waiting message after the user have chosen a tower or a wizard

    • onGameDeleted

      public void onGameDeleted(String info)
      Display a dialog that notify that a player have decided to delete the game that was previously saved and on which the user was connected. The user will be asked to choose if he wants to return to the main menu or to quit.
      Parameters:
      info - the information string that will be displayed
